column3: Set the theme to the given PySimpleGUI theme. Give a random theme if not a valid theme.
Set the value to [1] if you want the application to be full screen/otherwise set to 0.
Choose to have the background music playing.
The volume of the background music. Values from 0-1.
The volume of the sound effects. Values from 0-1.
Whether the game keeps track of your progress. Will disable Achievements and game progression.
